name: RAPL_XS_FUNC_PL4_LOW_VALUE
summary: Read and save all the RAPL domain contraint_* value, Write a very low value to 0x601(PL4), wrmsr 0x601 0, Enable rapl control: echo 1 > enable, Disable rapl control: echo 0 > enable, Read contraint_* value, and make sure they are changed, Re-enable RAPL control
